mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ep_task_book WHERE id = #{id} and is_del=0

SELECT etb.id, etb.send_date sendDate, etb.receive_time receiveTime, cs.NAME studentName FROM ep_task_book etb LEFT JOIN ep_adviser_student eas ON etb.adviser_student_id = eas.id LEFT JOIN cc_student cs ON cs.id = eas.student_id WHERE etb.is_history = 1 AND etb.is_del = 0 AND etb.adviser_student_id=#{adviserStudentId}

SELECT epc.NAME companyName, eoa.NAME adviserName, ct.NAME teacherName, etb.id taskBookId, etb.state FROM ep_task_book etb LEFT JOIN ep_adviser_student eas ON etb.adviser_student_id = eas.id AND eas.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN cc_teacher ct ON ct.id = eas.teacher_id LEFT JOIN ep_student_company esc ON eas.grade = esc.grade AND esc.is_del = 0 AND esc.student_id = eas.student_id LEFT JOIN ep_practice_company epc ON esc.company_id = epc.id AND epc.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN ep_out_adviser_student eoas ON eoas.student_company_id = esc.id AND eoas.is_del = 0 LEFT JOIN ep_out_adviser eoa ON eoa.id = eoas.adviser_id AND eoa.is_del = 0 WHERE eas.student_id = #{studentId} AND etb.is_del = 0 AND etb.is_history = 0 AND etb.state > 0
select * from ep_task_book where adviser_student_id=#{adviserStudentId} and is_del=0 and is_history=0

select etb.* from ep_task_book etb inner join ep_adviser_student eas ON etb.adviser_student_id = eas.id and eas.is_del=0 where etb.is_del=0 and eas.grade=#{grade} and eas.student_id=#{studentId} and etb.is_history=0
